page.title: 11CHANGING FACE OF SESSAY 1
page.content: Sessay is a village facing{changes likely to alter both its physical appearance and its inhabitants. Until recently people both lived and worked in the village. Now probably half the {working occupants}work elsewhere,their children are likely to move completely to find work, and nowadays both boys and girls may want a{career.} Indeed, the whole village and its way of life has been forced to look outwards. Once farmers bought & sold in the county, now they deal with large companies. {Grants and subsidies}influence their choice of crop. In a farming community there were and are many shared experi- ences such as lambing time or harvest. In the past when the village was more insular, families intermarried so that weddings, births, funerals, bound them together, giving a feeling of village community. {(Contd. on p.12>
